benchmark_details.name: Visual Relationship Authenticity Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: The dataset includes annotations of both true and false visual relationships among all objects/entities present in the captions of the Flickr30k dataset, aiding in the understanding of image content and grounded natural language processing.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To promote the study of both vision and language understanding by providing annotations for true and false visual relationships.

data.annotation: Annotated using dependency parsing and Amazon Mechanical Turk (crowdsourcing).

methods: Crowdsourced annotation via Amazon Mechanical Turk
methodology.calculation: Calculated based on true and false visual relationships extracted from the dataset.
methodology.interpretation: Precision and recall indicate the accuracy of the relationship detection.
methodology.validation: Validation of dataset through manually annotated examples and assessment of Amazon Mechanical Turk workers.
